```{r setup}
library(lifx)
```

There's three layers to the api:
1. a user facing function that checks the input and calls (user.R)
2. a function build to closely mirror the functionality of a particular endpoint of the lifx api, build around (endpoints.R)
3. a wrapper for the matching http (httr package) verb GET, PUT or POST (httr_wrappers.R)
